info.author: Barış Arıburnu
info.description:
yts.py
========

Simple wrapper for `yts.to API v2 <https://yts.to/api/>`_.


Installing
----------

ytspy is available on PyPI.

.. code-block:: bash

    $ pip install ytspy


Usage
-----

.. code-block:: python

    import ytspy
    
    # Data Format: json, xml or jsonp
    yts = ytspy.YTS('json')

    # list movies
    # Used to list and search through out all the available movies.
    # Can sort, filter, search and order the results
    list = yts.movie.list_movies(page=None, limit=None, quality=None,
                    minimum_rating=None, genre=None, sort_by=None,
                    order_by=None, query_term=None, with_rt_ratings=Non)

    # movie details
    # Returns the information about a specific movie
    movie = yts.movie.movie_details(movie_id, with_images=False, with_cast=False)

    # movie suggestions
    # Returns 4 related movies as suggestions for the user
    suggestions = yts.movie.movie_suggestions(movie_id)

    # movie comments
    # Returns all the comments for the movie with ID of 10
    comments = yts.movie.movie_comments(movie_id)

    # movie reviews
    # Returns all the IMDb movie reviews for the specified movie
    reviews = yts.movie.movie_reviews(movie_id)

    # movie parental guides
    # Returns all the parental guide ratings for the specified movie
    parental_guides = yts.movie.movie_parental_guides(movie_id)

    # list upcoming
    # Returns the 4 latest upcoming movies
    list_upcoming = yts.movie.list_upcoming()


YTS Endpoint Parameters
-----------------------

.. code-block:: python

    QUALITY = ['ALL', '720p', '1080p', '3D']

    GENRE = [
        'ALL', 'ACTION', 'ADVENTURE', 'ANIMATION', 'BIOGRAPHY',
        'COMEDY', 'CRIME', 'DOCUMENTARY', 'DRAMA', 'FAMILY',
        'FANTASY', 'FILM-NOIR', 'HISTORY', 'HORROR', 'MUSIC',
        'MUSICAL', 'MYSTERY', 'NEWS', 'ROMANCE', 'SCI-FI',
        'SHORT', 'SPORT', 'THRILLER', 'WAR', 'WESTERN'
    ]

    SORT = [
        'title', 'year', 'rating', 'peers', 'seeds',
        'download_count', 'like_count', 'date_added'
    ]

    DATA_FORMAT = [
        'json', 'xml', 'jsonp'
    ]

    URI = [
        'movie_details', 'list_movies', 'movie_suggestions',
        'movie_comments', 'movie_reviews', 'movie_parental_guides',
        'list_upcoming'
    ]
info.name: ytspy
